com.ti.debug.engine.scripting

Class BreakpointProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ti.debug.engine.scripting.BreakpointProperties

  • public class BreakpointProperties
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates the advanced breakpoint management methods. // Create Environment and open a debug session
    ScriptingEnvironment env = new ScriptionEnvironment();
    DebugSession mySession = myServer.openSession("*", "*");

    ...

    // Add a breakpoint at a file
    BreakpointProperties props = mySession.breakpoint.createProperties();

    props.setBoolean("Some.Property.Name", true);
    props.setString("Another.Property.Name", "a string");

    int nBkpt = mySession.breakpoint.add(props);

    ...

    // Remove a breakpoint
    mySession.breakpoint.remove(nBkpt);

      • setSourceLocation

        public void setSourceLocation(java.lang.String propertyName,
                              java.lang.String sourceFile,
                              int lineNumber)
                       throws ScriptingException
        Sets a breakpoint's location by source file and line number. This method performs no logical validation on the parameters passed to it.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - the path referring to the property to set
        sourceFile - the source file where the breakpoint will be located
        lineNumber - the line number on which the breakpoint will be set
        Throws:
        ScriptingException - when location cannot be set.
